agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that assists eligible persons in receiving prosthetic care.
service_description: Provides prosthetic assistance for lower limb amputees who have no other means of receiving a prosthesis. Services are provided at partnering clinics nationwide.
site_details: Visit website to download application, or call to have application sent by mail. -- Complete application form -- Find a local prosthetic clinic who will agree to work with this agency to provide services, and have that agency complete their portion of the application. See website for a list of partner clinics.-- Mail, fax, or email completed application to Limbs for Life.
site_eligibility: US citizens or legal residents of the United States -- In need of a leg prosthetic -- With NO insurance coverage or government assistance for prosthetics -- With financial need (based on assessment) -- Applicants must find a prosthetist or clinic willing to work with this agency. -- Patients with felony or misdemeanor criminal histories are considered on a case-by-case basis
